name: rag-ask-demo
description: A demo of a RAG application using OpenAI's API and Hono.js
author: Max Albrecht <1@178.is>

scripts.ci: pnpm run type-check && pnpm run test && pnpm run test:e2e
scripts.test: cross-env USE_MOCK_OPENAI=true AI_COMPLETION_PROVIDER=openai AI_COMPLETION_MODEL=gpt-3.5-turbo AI_EMBEDDING_PROVIDER=openai AI_EMBEDDING_MODEL=text-embedding-ada-002 OPENAI_API_KEY=test-key jest
scripts.test:e2e: playwright install && cross-env USE_MOCK_OPENAI=true AI_COMPLETION_PROVIDER=openai AI_COMPLETION_MODEL=gpt-3.5-turbo AI_EMBEDDING_PROVIDER=openai AI_EMBEDDING_MODEL=text-embedding-ada-002 OPENAI_API_KEY=test-key playwright test
